task.summary: Window resizing in function of the monitor, image resizing to use 15*15 square game room, main game loop and loading of level from .txt files.
Basic collision (Need to do the collision check on bomb planting)
Remove useless free space in player images.
Collision detection when planting bomb so the player can't plant on wall;
First working version of the game(Replay after a game do not work atm)
